in China (material examined and literature records).

Remarks.
Ischnosoma quadriguttatum
is one of the most widespread species of the genus, its distribution ranging from Pakistan to Indonesia . In China the species is very common in the central and southern parts of the country (
Fig. 70
). Records from Fujian, Gansu, Hainan, Hubei and Shaanxi are new province records.
